name: Hard Car Parking Pro
description:
Hard Car Parking Pro is a unique car simulator with parking missions. Realistic controls work more awesomely when mixed with the dynamic gameplay. You’ve got an on screen steering wheel so control your car with it, also use the break, accelerator to assist you in driving. Get ready to experience the most advance mission to brush up your car parking skills in to real car drift master. If you are looking to play a hard parking game with easy to learn but hard to park in side obstacles the you your search for perfect driving simulator is over.
Feartures:
- Realistic driving experience.
- Challenging levels.
- Fast controls.
- Realistic Controls
- High quality graphics.
- Vehicle color setting.
